actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide a tax credit for expenditures made in the exploration and development of new reserves of oil and gas in the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax credit for one-eighth of the expenses paid or incurred for the exploration and development of new oil and gas reserves in the United States.

titles.title: A bill to provide a tax credit for expenditures made in the exploration and development of new reserves of oil and gas in the United States.
